oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A Day's Journey by Luther Ray Johnson
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Luther Ray Johnson
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "A Day's Journey From the Cradle to Kirk Haven" an original manuscript autobiography by Luther Ray Johnson, 1959. Any use of material from this work must be cited: "A Day's Journey" by Luther Ray Johnson. This work is a revision of "Horizons and Beyond." Reminiscences of the author's life and history of the Johnson and related families. Genealogy, Genealogies, Autobiographies.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: History; Families;
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Loaned for scanning and returned to owner; the McClung Collection does not own the original volume.
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814.
